component.name: Thorium Browser

description.p: Thorium is an open-source browser project that aims to build a safer, faster, and more stable way to experience the web.
We invite you to join our effort to build a powerful platform for developing a new generation of web applications.
Thorium supports Vorbis, Theora, WebM, AAC, H.264, H.265, MP3, and HTML5 audio and video standards.
